Uses of Package
DataSaving

  • Packages that use DataSaving 
    Package Description
    DataSaving
    Package for storing in-game data, as well as saving into data file (encrypting the data beforehand) and retrieving data from data file for game operations
    pkg2048
    Package for making the 2048 game, including all the primary functions (game movements, displaying score, best score, clock, UI like main menu, statistics, buttons,...), except the functions of saving information, which is dependant on the DataSaving package.
  • Classes in DataSaving used by DataSaving 
    Class and Description
    Information
    Store information in a game
    Information.MilestoneTile
    Information for milestone tiles reached in all games
  • Classes in DataSaving used by pkg2048 
    Class and Description
    Information
    Store information in a game
    SaveOpen
    Class for saving and retrieving information from save file
